title: What are some of the trends and fads in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I hate to say it but “Masks” but is a trend whether we like them or not. We have drive by birthday parties where people just wave and drop off a present. TV award shows where the audience is replaced by banks of people on video screens. Sweatpants and other cozy and cute at home outfits. Lots of tie dye fashion as people seek out whimsical and cheerful clothing. Outdoor dining everywhere and waitstaff wearing plastic face shields. Home cooking instead of eating out-lots of bread baking.

Man buns - like ponytails but more on top of the head. I see a lot of them on young sports stars and guys in their twenties around London. Key chain sanitizer dispensers. Fashion face masks and scarves. Vaping. Phone apps connecting you to home security cameras either to check on your pets at home or see who rang your front door bell. Remote activation of car and home devices. For example more and more people can use their phone or tablet or other gadget to start the car, turn the heating or air conditioning on, or boil the kettle for when they arrive home for example. Live broadcasting on social media. Video calling. Pentagram harnesses and underwear worn as fashion outerwear. Eyelash bralettes and sports bras for example. Face swapping tools for making videos. Selfie filters.
